column2: Mouse had a left-handed tilt when walking.  Uncoordinated/uncontrolled body movements. Accelerated respiratory rate.  No primary visible upon initial inspection, but one was found between shoulders during necropsy.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Blood evident on brain.  Large tumor associated with the heart was noticed.  Small nodules adjacent to lungs as well.
No cell line or tumor chunks frozen
